jobDescription: BI LINGUAL (ENGLISH/SPANISH) CUSTOMER SERVICE REPS NEEDED!Fast growing, multi-million dollar financial services firm in New Hyde Park, Long Island is looking for Flexible Hour, Bi Lingual, Part Time Customer Service Representatives to work in our busy call center. If this sounds like the job for you please send your resume AND call us at the number below.*** AFTER YOU SEND YOUR RESUME****Please call (516) 554-0961 and tell us about yourself in your best telephone voice.
